reviews.review: It's good, it's just that there are so many cheaters. Making the game unfair and boring.
Would you recommend this game to other players? Well yes, but actually no.
If you actually play the game i feel bad for you.
dust 2 diye bi map var cok ıyı
Pq eles dropam meu Trust Factor sem motivo e agr eu só to caindo com cheatado, valve filha da puta, reavaliando minha avaliação depois de 615 horas, o jogo continua um jogo de filho da puta
Круто что есть такая игра в которой есть отличное токсичное комьюнити и отличный анти-чит с помощью которого уже десятки читеров отлетают в бан.ШУТКА

dogshit ass game full of hackers and smurfers you cant do shit about, on top you have teammates from russia/turkey or marocco that either blast music to rape your fucking hearing or you have the north africans that have 10 familys in the background and a mic out of a callcenter in india.
really not recommended to anyone, i say as aa person with over 1000 hours if you count all of my accounts.

Ебейшая хуета, провел в ней 600+ часов (играл не только на этом аккаунте) и получил VAC не используя никаких читов, скриптов и прочей вспомогательной хуеты. А твари которые играли со спинботом играют до сих пор.
O jogo é muito bom, quem gosta eu recomendo é isso!

Also ich habe csgo schon lange gespielt und auch gegen einige Hacker. So ich habe jetzt einen VAC Ban bekommen weil ich einen skinchanger benutzt habe .... ein Program welches mir im spiel keinen vorteil verschafft sondern lediglich den Skin der Waffe ändert. Da frag ich mich jetzt wo dort das Problem ist weil ich finde das ein wallhack/aimbot um weiten schlimmer als ein skinchanger aber gut ich finde, dass das spiel sowieso zu viele smurfer/richtige hacker hat also daher Tschüss CSGO

Best competitive shooter ever. Most unfortunate that there is so many cheaters. If you solo queue you have approx. 75% chance to have a cheater either in your team or the enemy team (based on personal experience). There is 500-1000 VAC bans per day. This is only the people that get caught by VAC. There is so many more cheaters with private cheats that are not detected. CSGO integrated anticheat overwatch seems quite useless. Disappointing service by Valve.
good hra určite zábavná až na tých občasných cheaterov aj v platenej verzii :)
